short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Atmoz, enhancing Azure Portal with live cost insights and recommendations for ultimate cloud visibility and ease of use

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Atmoz was built to turn every software developer (and their team) into a cloud hero. Or DevOps Genius- whichever you prefer to be…

We made it really simple to reduce costs and avoid the all-too-common cloud mistakes. Atmoz enhances the Azure Portal with live, real -time cost insights and recommendations for ultimate cloud visibility and ease of use.

How?  
✅ Simple, 1-Click self-onboarding: Simply download our FREE plug-in. That's it, you're ready to go.
✅ 1-Click Optimization: Fix cloud inefficiencies instantly with a one-click "Fix-it" button – with zero effort.
✅ Clear Cost Visibility: Instantly see how much each resource costs you right then and there, in real-time! No more waiting for an invoice that comes too late and no one understands. 
✅ Team Spend Management: For team leaders, our seamless Active Directory integration lets you track and manage team cloud usage effortlessly, with a clear owner, preventing oversight on active machines. 

No more $10K “oops I left my VM running” mistakes. Work smarter. Save time. Save money. 

What are you waiting for?? Download now!
